properties.Name: Dobolu
properties.description: A handful of villagers collect well-known plants in the summer, while children are encouraged to collect berries to make into jam. A traditional medicine practitioner treats patients for free and is open to showing where the herbs are found, in an effort to pass on his traditional knowledge.

properties.Name: Salkyn Tor State Park
properties.description: Salkyn Tor National Park is located just outside the regional capital, past the small airport and about 12 kilometers east of Naryn City. The public space is partially protected as being part of the Salkyn-Tor State Park, which covers a considerable area along the Naryn River immediately to the east of Naryn. There are about 1,800 species of plants and many seasonally beautiful alpine flowers.

properties.Name: Naryn Natural Reserve
properties.description:
Naryn State Reserve is located at the source of the Naryn River, and covers the hillside forest of Naryn-Too mountain range.

The total area of ​​the reserve is about 37 thousand hectares. The main task of the reserve is to protect and preserve coniferous forests and alpine meadows.

properties.Name: Eki-Naryn
properties.description: Among our participants, there were no identified traditional medicine practitioners but high interest in learning about different types of plants. This was particularly evident among pasture users, who wish to learn more about weeds and unpalatable plants for their animals. Here, juniper is commonly collected and burned for its fragrance, as part of a ceremonial cleansing of the house.

properties.Name: Aigine Cultural Research Center
properties.description: Aigine Cultural Research Center was established in 2004 as a public foundation. The center carries out its activities in the field of traditional knowledge, education, humanities and social research. Thus, the Aigine CRC implements educational, cultural and scientific research projects based on external foreign grants. These project activities are directed at preserving, developing and integrating traditional wisdom with contemporary life and aiming to incorporate the positive potential of traditional wisdom in decision-making at all levels of public and political life.

properties.Name: Kyrgyz National Agrarian University
properties.description: The center for distance learning and advanced training at the Institute of international and distance education provides education in distance learning.

properties.Name: Pamir Botanical Garden
properties.description: Not far from Khorugh (the administrative centre of Gorno-Badakhshan Autonomous Oblast) at 2,320m above sea level, on an ancient river terrace at the confluence of the Ghunt and Shohdara rivers, is the green “Roof of the World” – the A. Gursky Pamiri Botanical Gardens, the highest Botanical Gardens in the CIS. Seeds are exchanged with 170 partners in the former Soviet republics, and about 200 in 40 other countries. The Pamiri Botanical Gardens have tested more than 30,000 kinds of plants in their nurseries.

properties.Name: Naryn State University
properties.description: Satybaldy state university named after the mountain on May 22, 1996, it proves with the Decree of the President of the Kyrgyz Republic in Naryn Agricultural Technical College, Mambetakunov prestigious educational institution, the Regional Institute and the Institute of architecture and construction on the basis of regional branch opened in the city of Naryn. The opening of the University of Naryn, is a great honor for the people of the republic are not only highly educated staff training necessary to address the issues of population, social and cultural contribution. December 18, 2009, the Government of the Kyrgyz Republic was awarded the Order of Naryn State University Satybaldy Naamatova name.
